translations: lemma extended_AxE[intro!]: "F, \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, \<Delta>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F, \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, \<Delta>
by (intro extended_Ax) (simp add: add.commute inter_add_right2)
theorem HCSC: "AX10 \<union> set_mset \<Gamma> \<turnstile>\<^sub>H F \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#F#}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. AX10 \<union> set_mset \<Gamma> \<turnstile>\<^sub>H F \<Longrightarrow>
    \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, {#}
proof(induction rule: HC.induct)
case (Ax F)
thus ?case
proof
note SCp.intros(3-)[intro!]

proof (state)
this:
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F, ?\<Delta> \<Longrightarrow>
  \<^bold>\<not> ?F, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>
  ?F, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> \<^bold>\<not> ?F, ?\<Delta>
  ?F, ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?F \<^bold>\<and> ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>
  \<lbrakk>?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F, ?\<Delta>;
   ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?G, ?\<Delta>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F \<^bold>\<and> ?G, ?\<Delta>
  \<lbrakk>?F, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>;
   ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?F \<^bold>\<or> ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F, ?G, ?\<Delta> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F \<^bold>\<or> ?G, ?\<Delta>
  \<lbrakk>?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F, ?\<Delta>;
   ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>
                    ?\<Delta>
  ?F, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?G, ?\<Delta> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> ?G, ?\<Delta>

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. F \<in> AX10 \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, {#}
 2. F \<in># \<Gamma> \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, {#}
text\<open>Essentially, we need to prove all the axioms of Hibert Calculus in Sequent Calculus.\<close>

proof (state)
this:
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F, ?\<Delta> \<Longrightarrow>
  \<^bold>\<not> ?F, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>
  ?F, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> \<^bold>\<not> ?F, ?\<Delta>
  ?F, ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?F \<^bold>\<and> ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>
  \<lbrakk>?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F, ?\<Delta>;
   ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?G, ?\<Delta>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F \<^bold>\<and> ?G, ?\<Delta>
  \<lbrakk>?F, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>;
   ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?F \<^bold>\<or> ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F, ?G, ?\<Delta> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F \<^bold>\<or> ?G, ?\<Delta>
  \<lbrakk>?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F, ?\<Delta>;
   ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> ?G, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>
                    ?\<Delta>
  ?F, ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?G, ?\<Delta> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> ?G, ?\<Delta>

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. F \<in> AX10 \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, {#}
 2. F \<in># \<Gamma> \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, {#}
have A: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (F \<^bold>\<or> G)#}" for F G
by blast
have B: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (F \<^bold>\<or> G)#}" for G F
by blast
have C: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#(F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> H) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> ((G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> H) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> ((F \<^bold>\<or> G) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> H))#}" for F H G

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>
    (F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> H) \<^bold>\<rightarrow>
    (G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> H) \<^bold>\<rightarrow>
    (F \<^bold>\<or> G) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> H, {#}
by blast
have D: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#(F \<^bold>\<and> G) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F#}" for F G
by blast
have E: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#(F \<^bold>\<and> G) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> G#}" for F G
by blast
have F: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (F \<^bold>\<and> G))#}" for F G

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>
    F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F \<^bold>\<and> G, {#}
by blast
have G: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#(F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> \<bottom>) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> \<^bold>\<not> F#}" for F

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>
    (F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> \<bottom>) \<^bold>\<rightarrow>
    \<^bold>\<not> F, {#}
by blast
have H: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#\<^bold>\<not> F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> \<bottom>)#}" for F

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>
    \<^bold>\<not> F \<^bold>\<rightarrow>
    F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> \<bottom>, {#}
by blast
have I: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#(\<^bold>\<not> F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> \<bottom>) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F#}" for F

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>
    (\<^bold>\<not> F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> \<bottom>) \<^bold>\<rightarrow>
    F, {#}
by blast
have K: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F)#}" for F G

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>
    F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F, {#}
by blast

have L: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#(F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> H)) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> ((F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> G) \<^bold>\<rightarrow> (F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> H))#}" for F G H

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow>
    (F \<^bold>\<rightarrow>
     G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> H) \<^bold>\<rightarrow>
    (F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> G) \<^bold>\<rightarrow>
    F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> H, {#}
by blast
have J: "F \<in> AX0 \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#F#}" for F
by(induction rule: AX0.induct; intro K L)
assume "F \<in> AX10"
thus ?thesis
by(induction rule: AX10.induct; intro A B C D E F G H I J)
next
assume "F \<in> set_mset \<Gamma>"

proof (state)
this:
  F \<in># \<Gamma>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. F \<in># \<Gamma> \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, {#}
thus ?thesis
by(intro extended_Ax) simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, {#}

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
next
case (MP F G)
from MP

proof (chain)
picking this:
  AX10 \<union> set_mset \<Gamma> \<turnstile>\<^sub>H F
  AX10 \<union> set_mset \<Gamma> \<turnstile>\<^sub>H
  F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> G
  \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, {#}
  \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> G, {#}
have IH: "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#F#}" "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#F \<^bold>\<rightarrow> G#}"
by blast+
with ImpR_inv[where \<Delta>=Mempty, simplified]
have "F,\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#G#}"
by auto
moreover
from IH(1) weakenR

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, {#}
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?\<Delta> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> ?F, ?\<Delta>
have "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> F, {#G#}"
by blast
ultimately
show "\<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> {#G#}"
using cut[where F=F]
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<Gamma> \<Rightarrow> G, {#}

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
